document_data.name: Thomdor Ammaeth
document_data.mainbody: '''Baron Thomdor Ammaeth''' was the cousin of King [[Azoun IV]] and Warden of the Eastern Marches of [[Cormyr]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]]. He lived in [[Arabel]].
document_data.Description: Thomdor was a very large overweight man with a big belly. His hair was dark and messy, and streaked with grey.
document_data.History: In [[1369 DR]], Thomdor was on a hunt with King Azoun IV, [[Bhereu Ammaeth|Duke Bhereu]], and [[Aunadar Bleth]] when he was poisoned by a magical [[abraxus]] in the [[abraxus affair]], putting him in a coma-like state. He eventually succumbed and died that same year.
document_data.Relatives: Thomdor was the cousin of the King of Cormyr, Azoun IV, and was the brother of Duke Bhereu Ammaeth.
